To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private HangingMan _hangingman;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_hangingman = HangingMan(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_hangingman.IsReady)
{
    var period = _hangingman.Period.Value;
    var current = _hangingman.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.hangingman = self.HangingMan(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.hangingman.IsReady:
    period = self.hangingman.Period.Value
    current = self.hangingman.Current.Value
